# TerraBT - SAP Business Technology Platform Consulting

> TerraBT is a specialized SAP BTP consulting company providing enterprise-grade solutions worldwide. We help organizations transform their business with SAP's cloud platform technologies.

## About TerraBT

TerraBT is an independent SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) consulting firm serving clients in 40+ countries. We specialize in delivering modern, scalable, and secure SAP BTP solutions that drive digital transformation.

## Our Services

### SAP BTP Architecture & Design
Strategic architecture planning for scalable, secure SAP BTP environments. Services include landscape design, security architecture, high availability configuration, and cloud infrastructure setup.

### SAP Fiori Application Development
Custom Fiori application development using SAPUI5 framework. We build responsive, user-friendly applications with modern UI/UX design following SAP Fiori guidelines.

### SAP CAP Development
Full-stack development using SAP Cloud Application Programming Model. We create robust backend services, OData APIs, and enterprise-grade applications.

### SAP Build Apps (Low-Code Development)
Rapid application development using SAP Build Apps platform. Ideal for citizen developers and quick prototyping of business applications.

### SAP Build Process Automation
Workflow automation, RPA (Robotic Process Automation), and document processing solutions to streamline business operations.

### AI-Powered Invoice Processing
Intelligent invoice processing automation with advanced AI for accurate data extraction and seamless SAP integration.

### SAP BTP Integration Suite
Enterprise integration services including Cloud Integration (CPI), API Management, Open Connectors, and Integration Advisor implementation.

### SAP Event Mesh
Event-driven architecture implementation for real-time, responsive business processes using SAP Event Mesh.

### Offline PWA Applications
Progressive Web Applications with offline capabilities for seamless user experience on any device, anywhere.

### SAP BTP Database Management
Database design, optimization, and management for SAP HANA Cloud, PostgreSQL, and SAP ASE databases.

### Design Thinking Workshops
User-centered design approach to identify innovative SAP BTP solutions that solve real business challenges.

## Technical Expertise

- SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP)
- SAP Fiori / SAPUI5
- SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP)
- SAP Build Apps
- SAP Build Process Automation
- SAP Integration Suite
- SAP Event Mesh
- SAP HANA Cloud
- SAP S/4HANA Integration
- Progressive Web Applications (PWA)
- AI/ML Integration

We serve clients globally with particular focus on:
- Japan (日本)
- United States
- Germany
- United Kingdom

- Singapore
- And 35+ additional countries
